description: Measures how frequently an account engages in platform activities relative to its age.
definition: AAF = \frac{\text{sesscount}}{\text{acctagespan}}

description: Aggregates multiple authenticity indicators into a single score.
definition: CAS = 0.3 \times \text{authenscore} + 0.3 \times \text{cntuniqscore} + 0.4 \times \text{convnatval} where values are normalized to [0,1]

description: Measures the rate of network growth considering both followers and following.
definition: NGV = \sqrt{\text{followgrowrate}^2 + \text{followinggrowrate}^2}

description: Combines multiple bot-detection metrics into a single score.
definition: BBI = 0.4 \times \text{botlikscore} + 0.3 \times \text{autobehavscore} + 0.3 \times (1 - \text{convnatval})

description: Calculates overall security risk based on multiple factors.
definition: SRS = 0.4 \times \text{riskval} + 0.3 \times (1 - \text{trustval}) + 0.3 \times \text{impactval}

description: Evaluates overall profile credibility.
definition: PCI = 0.3 \times \text{credscore} + 0.3 \times \text{reputscore} + 0.4 \times \text{completeness}

description: Measures likelihood of coordinated behavior across accounts.
definition: CAS = 0.5 \times \text{coordscore} + 0.3 \times \text{netinflscore} + 0.2 \times \frac{\text{clustsize}}{100}

description: Quantifies attempts to evade detection.
definition: TEI = 0.4 \times \text{vpnratio} + 0.3 \times \frac{\text{proxycount}}{10} + 0.3 \times \frac{\text{ipcountrynum}}{20}

description: Evaluates content manipulation patterns.
definition: CMS = 0.4 \times (1 - \text{cntuniqscore}) + 0.3 \times \text{mediareratio} + 0.3 \times (1 - \text{txtuniq})

description: Calculates priority for moderation review.
definition: MPS = 0.3 \times \frac{\text{abuserepnum}}{1000} + 0.4 \times \text{impactval} + 0.3 \times \text{riskval}

description: Identifies accounts requiring immediate attention.
definition: An account with SRS > 0.8 and at least one active security detection with threatlvl = 'Critical'

description: Identifies coordinated bot activity.
definition: A cluster where clustsize > 10 and average BBI > 0.7 for all accounts in cluster

description: Identifies highly trustworthy accounts.
definition: An account with PCI > 0.8 and no security detections in the past 180 days

description: Identifies accounts mass-producing similar content.
definition: An account with CMS > 0.7 and postfreq > 50 posts per day

description: Identifies related accounts used for manipulation.
definition: A group of accounts where linkacctnum > 5 and CAS > 0.8

description: Identifies inactive bot accounts.
definition: An account with acctstatus = 'Dormant'.

description: Identifies accounts systematically using VPNs.
definition: An account with TEI > 0.8 and at least 3 different countries in login locations

description: Identifies artificial engagement patterns.
definition: An account where engauth < 0.3 and tempinteractpat = 'Automated'

description: Identifies repeat policy violators.
definition: An account with susphist > 2 and warnnum > 5

description: Identifies coordinated content amplification.
definition: A cluster where clustrole = 'Amplifier' and coordscore > 0.8

description: Illustrates confidence value in detection scores.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Values above 0.8 indicate high-confidence detections, while values below 0.3 suggest uncertain results requiring manual review.

description: Illustrates coordination score meaning.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Scores above 0.7 strongly indicate coordinated behavior, while scores below 0.2 suggest independent actions.

description: Illustrates engagement authenticity score.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Scores above 0.9 indicate highly authentic engagement, while scores below 0.4 suggest artificial or automated engagement.

description: Illustrates content uniqueness scoring.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Scores above 0.8 indicate highly unique content, while scores below 0.3 suggest duplicate or templated content.

description: Illustrates conversation naturalness value.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Values above 0.7 indicate natural human conversation, while values below 0.3 suggest automated or scripted responses.

description: Illustrates IP reputation scoring.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Scores above 0.8 indicate trusted IPs, while scores below 0.3 suggest potentially malicious or compromised IPs.

description: Illustrates profile completeness scoring.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Values above 0.8 indicate well-maintained profiles, while values below 0.4 suggest placeholder or abandoned profiles.

description: Illustrates trust value meaning.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Values above 0.7 indicate highly trusted accounts, while values below 0.3 suggest untrusted or suspicious accounts.

description: Illustrates impact value meaning.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 1. Values above 0.7 indicate high-impact violations requiring immediate attention, while values below 0.3 suggest low-priority issues.

description: Illustrates bot likelihood scoring.
definition: Ranges from 0 to 100. Scores above 70 strongly indicate bot behavior, while scores below 20 suggest human-like behavior patterns.

description: Evaluates risk across multiple platform types for the same account.
definition: CPRI = SRS \times (1 + 0.2 \times \text{ipcountrynum})

description: Measures the extent of network manipulation considering bot behavior and coordination.
definition: NMI = 0.6 \times BBI + 0.4 \times CAS

description: Calculates trust score considering both profile credibility and content authenticity.
definition: ETS = 0.5 \times PCI + 0.5 \times CAS

description: Assesses risk from coordinated bot networks.
definition: CBR = BBI \times CAS \times \frac{\text{clustsize}}{100}

description: Evaluates content security considering manipulation and authenticity.
definition: CSI = 0.7 \times (1 - CMS) + 0.3 \times CAS

description: Measures degree of automation in account behavior.
definition: ABS = 0.4 \times BBI + 0.3 \times TEI + 0.3 \times (1 - CAS)

description: Evaluates trustworthiness of account's network connections.
definition: NTS = PCI \times (1 - NGV) \times (1 - CBR)

description: Measures potential impact of manipulated content.
definition: CIS = CMS \times MPS \times \frac{\text{netinflscore}}{100}

description: Assesses authentication-related risks.
definition: ARS = 0.5 \times TEI + 0.3 \times (1 - PCI) + 0.2 \times SRS

description: Quantifies unusual behavior patterns.
definition: BAS = 0.4 \times BBI + 0.4 \times AAF + 0.2 \times NGV

description: Identifies dangerous coordinated bot networks.
definition: A Bot Network with CBR > 0.8 and SRS > 0.7

description: Identifies reliable content creators.
definition: An account with ETS > 0.8 and CIS < 0.2

description: Identifies accounts with suspicious authentication patterns.
definition: An account with ARS > 0.7 and at least one VPN Abuser detection

description: Identifies accounts posing network-level security risks.
definition: An account with NTS < 0.3 and is part of a Bot Network

description: Identifies coordinated content manipulation groups.
definition: A Sockpuppet Network where all accounts have CMS > 0.7

description: Identifies automated spam distribution networks.
definition: A Bot Network where average ABS > 0.8 and all accounts are Content Farms

description: Identifies threats operating across multiple platforms.
definition: A High-Risk Account with CPRI > 0.9 and is part of a Sockpuppet Network

description: Identifies groups showing unusual behavior patterns.
definition: A cluster where average BAS > 0.8 and contains at least one Bot Network

description: Identifies large-scale manipulation efforts.
definition: A Content Manipulation Ring where CIS > 0.8 for all accounts

description: Identifies sophisticated, persistent security threats.
definition: A High-Risk Bot Network with NMI > 0.9 and TEI > 0.8

description: Measures deviation from established temporal activity patterns.
definition: TPDS = \sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^{24} (\frac{\text{obsfreq}_i - \text{expfreq}_i}{\text{expfreq}_i})^2}

description: Quantifies account's position and influence in interaction network.
definition: NIC = 0.4 \times \text{connqualscore} + 0.3 \times \text{netinflscore} + 0.3 \times \text{interactdiv}

description: Measures behavioral correlation across linked accounts.
definition: MACI = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} \sum_{j=i+1}^{n} \text{corr}(i,j)}{\binom{n}{2}} where n is linked accounts

description: Quantifies stability of account reputation over time.
definition: RVI = \frac{\sigma_{\text{reputscore}}}{\mu_{\text{reputscore}}} \times (1 + \frac{|\Delta\text{reputscore}|}{\Delta t})

description: Analyzes patterns in content posting and sharing.
definition: CDPS = 0.4 \times \text{entropy}(\text{posttimes}) + 0.3 \times \text{burstiness} + 0.3 \times (1 - \text{periodicity})

description: Measures consistency of account behavior patterns.
definition: BCS = (1 - TPDS) \times (1 - RVI) \times (1 - \frac{\text{patterndev}}{100})

description: Quantifies synchronized activities across account clusters.
definition: NSI = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} \sum_{j=i+1}^{n} \text{sync}(i,j)}{\text{clustsize}} \times MACI

description: Measures the cascade effect of content sharing.
definition: CAE = \text{CIS} \times NIC \times \log(1 + \text{resharecount})

description: Evaluates consistency of authentication behaviors.
definition: APS = (1 - TEI) \times BCS \times (1 - \frac{\text{authanom}}{100})

description: Measures behavioral correlation across platforms.
definition: CPCS = CPRI \times MACI \times (1 + \frac{\text{platformlinks}}{10})

description: Identifies sophisticated influence campaigns.
definition: A network where NSI > 0.8 and CAE > 0.7 and contains at least one Content Manipulation Ring

description: Identifies accounts with inconsistent behavioral patterns.
definition: An account with BCS < 0.3 and TPDS > 0.7 and is not a Trusted Account

description: Identifies coordinated bot activity across platforms.
definition: A Bot Network where CPCS > 0.8 and all accounts have similar MACI patterns

description: Identifies groups with suspicious authentication patterns.
definition: A cluster where average APS < 0.3 and contains at least one Authentication Risk Account

description: Identifies accounts with unusual influence patterns.
definition: An account with NIC > 0.8 and CAE > 0.7 that is part of a Coordinated Influence Operation

description: Identifies coordinated reputation manipulation.
definition: A Content Manipulation Ring where all accounts have RVI > 0.7 and similar CDPS patterns

description: Identifies groups with highly synchronized activities.
definition: A cluster where NSI > 0.9 and all accounts have similar BCS patterns

description: Identifies sophisticated cross-platform threats.
definition: A Cross-Platform Threat where CPCS > 0.8 and all accounts are part of a Synchronized Behavior Cluster

description: Identifies sophisticated influence operations.
definition: A Mass Manipulation Campaign containing at least one Network Influence Hub and high NSI

description: Identifies sustained abnormal behavior patterns.
definition: A Behavioral Pattern Anomaly that persists for over 30 days and maintains high TPDS

description: Categorizes accounts into four groups based on their TEI values.
definition: Q_{TEI} =  egin{cases} 1 & 	ext{if TEI} in [0, P_{25}] \ 2 & 	ext{if TEI} in (P_{25}, P_{50}] \ 3 & 	ext{if TEI} in (P_{50}, P_{75}] \ 4 & 	ext{if TEI} in (P_{75}, P_{100}] \end{cases} where P_n represents the nth percentile of TEI values

description: The most recent bot likelihood score for an account based on security detection timestamps.
definition: LBS_a = \text{botlikscore}(\max_{t \in T_a} \text{detecttime}_t) where T_a is the set of all detection timestamps for account a

description: Measures the potential risk to an accountâ€™s reputation based on past moderation actions and low reputation scores.
definition: An account with reputscore < 30 and high abuserepnum, prioritized by the top quartile of abuse reports.

description: Identifies accounts with substantial network influence and frequent posting activity, acting as key amplifiers in coordinated networks.
definition: An account with netinflscore > 80 and postfreq > 30 posts per day.

description: Identifies accounts with elevated engagement levels based on the number of sessions or total posting frequency.
definition: An account with session_count > 1000 or total_post_frequency > 50.

description: Measures the total number of session records associated with an account.
definition: SC_a = \left| \{ \text{sessref} \in \text{sessionbehavior} \mid \text{sessprofref} = \text{profkey}, \text{profaccref} = a \} \right|

description: Measures the total posting frequency across all sessions for an account.
definition: TPF_a = \sum_{\text{cntref} \in \text{contentbehavior}} \text{postfreq}, \quad \text{where } \text{cntsessref} = \text{sessref}, \text{sessprofref} = \text{profkey}, \text{profaccref} = a

description: Identifies accounts with elevated engagement levels based on the number of sessions or total posting frequency.
definition: An account with session_count > 1000 or total_post_frequency > 50.

description: A ranking system that orders accounts based on their NIC scores from highest to lowest.
definition: \text{rank}_i = |\{j : \text{NIC}_j > \text{NIC}_i\}| + 1 where i is the current account and j iterates over all accounts

description: A categorical risk level assigned based on an account's TEI Quartile.
definition: A category assigned as 'Low Risk' (Quartile 1), 'Moderate Risk' (Quartile 2), 'High Risk' (Quartile 3), or 'Very High Risk' (Quartile 4) based on the account's calculated TEI Quartile.

description: A key used to group related accounts identified as part of the same network or cluster.
definition: In this context, the platform identifier (`platident`) associated with the accounts in the potential Amplification Network is the cluster identifier.

description: The total number of unique accounts within an identified cluster.
definition: Calculated using COUNT(DISTINCT account_index) for accounts grouped by the cluster identifier.

description: The highest coordination score observed among the members of an identified cluster.
definition: \max_{a \in cluster C} (\text{coordscore}_a)

description: A collection (array) of the unique account indexes belonging to an identified cluster.
definition: \{ \text{accindex}_a \mid a \in cluster C \}

description: An estimated timestamp of the last known activity for an account, used when direct session timestamps are unavailable or insufficient.
definition: Derived as \max(\text{detecttime}) from associated securitydetection records for an account.

description: A flag or status assigned to an account to indicate the need or priority level for manual review.
definition: A field in the `account` table set to a specific value like 'Review_Inactive_Trusted' to signal that an otherwise trusted account requires review due to prolonged inactivity.

description: A condition indicating that an account has not demonstrated recent activity based on available data proxies.
definition: Condition met when: \text{last activity proxy time} < (\text{CURRENT_DATE} - \text{'90 days'})
